|brand = FriendlyARM |model = NanoPi NEO |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = Plus2 |revision = v1.1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 08/06/2019 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.com/wiki/NanoPi_NEO_Plus2 |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Allwinner;H5; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARMv8-A |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 816 <!-- 1.2 GHz --> |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = eMMC v5.1 |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = Samsung;KLM8G1GETF-B041; |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = DDR3 |ram1type1 = SDRAM |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4B8G1646DMYKO; |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |eth2chip = Realtek;RTL8211E;RTL8211E-VB-CG; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 02:01:BD |oui = 8C:F7:10,
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;2017.11;; |stockos = Linux;4.14.111;FriendlyCore (UbuntuCore 16.04);
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 2 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B
|serial = yes,, 3.3V TTL,, 8-pin header,, populated,, (115200 8N1) |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, Micro SD Card slot, GPIO, I2C, SPI, UART, |addchip = 3-pin Microprocessor Reset Circuit;ON Semi;NCP803;;1;,,, 1A, 1.5MHz PWM Step-Down DC/DC Converter;Richtek;RT8059;;1;,,, 2.5A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy Corp;SY8032E;;1;,,, 2A, 1MHz Synchronous Step-Down Regulator; Silergy Corp;SY8089;;1;,,, 3A, 1.2MHz Synchronous Step-Down Switcher;MPS;MP2143;;1;,,, 300mA CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9193;;2;,,, |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = root |defaultpass = fa |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = Armbian, OpenWrt (WIP),
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 07/2017 |estprice = 25 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = AMPAK AP6212 |rad1modif = SDIO (module) |rad1chip1 = Broadcom;BCM43430; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = U.FL |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4 |rad1correv = <!-- core revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |rad1cap = <!-- radio capabilities, Leave blank for none or unknown -->
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== {{see also|NanoPi series|List of Single-board computers}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: ''[[Allwinner]]'' H5 (Quad-core Cortex-A53) @816MHz *GPU: ''Mali-450MP4'' @600MHz (H.265/HEVC 4K) *Memory: 1GB (DDR3) SDRAM *Onboard Storage: 8GB (eMMC v5.1), :TF card (max. 64GB)/MMC card slot *WLAN: 802.11b/g/n (1T1R) Wi-Fi, Bluetooth 4.0 :[[AMPAK AP6212]](A) ([[Broadcom]] BCM43430) *Ports: 1x GbE LAN, 2x USB 2.0 ports
==Links of Interest== *[http://wiki.friendlyarm.com/wiki/index.php/NanoPi_NEO_Plus2 ''NanoPi NEO Plus 2'' on '''FriendlyARM''' Wiki] *[http://linux-sunxi.org/FriendlyARM_NanoPi_NEO_Plus_2 ''FriendlyARM NanoPi NEO Plus 2'' on '''Linux-Sunxi''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2017/07/03/25-nanopi-neo-plus2-board-adds-8gb-flash-wifi-bluetooth-more-ram-and-an-extra-usb-port/ ''$25 NanoPi NEO Plus2 Board'' on '''CNX|Software''' ]
==Flashing== {{Flashnotice}} ===Flashing OpenWrt=== {{OpenWrtNotice|broadcomwifi}} {{OpenWrt |techdata = https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/friendlyarm/friendlyarm_nanopi_neo_plus2 |wikipage = https://openwrt.org/toh/friendlyarm/nanopi_neo_plus2 |forumpage = |forumpage2 = |forumpage3 = |github = |target = sunxi |subtarget = cortexa53 |arch = aarch64_cortex-a53 |support_started_version = 18.06.0 |current_supported_version = auto |unsupportedfuncntions = WiFi 2.4GHz, WIP |comment = Both 512MB and 1024MB RAM versions are available }} Please insert instructions here
